EssilorLuxottica revenue up 7.1% in Q4 driven by China, BrazilRevenue at eyewear maker EssilorLuxottica rose 7.1% at constant exchange rates in the last quarter of 2023 boosted by China and Brazil, reaching 6.25 billion euros ($6.7 billion). Wed, 14 Feb 2024 17:14:39 GMT ARKRR2OPINJD5KMXATK2YQSO74 https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/essilorluxottica-revenue-up-71-q4-driven-by-china-brazil-2024-02-14/Reuters商业零售与消费品
NATO's Stoltenberg urges US House to pass Ukraine aid, says China watchingNATO boss Jens Stoltenberg urged the U.S. House of Representatives on Wednesday to pass a "vital" multi-billion dollar military aid package for Ukraine, telling lawmakers that China would be emboldened if Russia wins its war. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 14:58:47 GMT GX2QTRDS3NJ47KG6CG67J6Q72E https://www.reuters.com/world/natos-stoltenberg-urges-us-house-pass-ukraine-aid-says-china-watching-2024-02-14/Andrew Gray, Johnny Cotton世界
Ronaldo gives Al-Nassr the edge in Asian CL last 16Cristiano Ronaldo broke Al-Fayha's resistance nine minutes from time to give Al-Nassr a 1-0 win over fellow Saudi Pro League side in the first leg of their Asian Champions League last 16 clash in Riyadh on Wednesday. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 14:44:20 GMT HDXUOM34VBJQNHVUTV5SCRHQXU https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/late-eid-equaliser-denies-kewell-debut-win-asian-champions-league-2024-02-14/Michael Church运动的足球
Philippines deploys warship in western waters to 'safeguard maritime interests'The Philippines has deployed a warship off the waters of Palawan island facing the South China Sea to "protect its maritime interests", a senior navy official said, in a move that may irk China. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 12:43:31 GMT YUHVZTSIZZJKLBUDZY2ZH4ZOLQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-deploys-warship-western-waters-safeguard-maritime-interests-2024-02-14/Reuters世界亚太地区
No solution to WTO appeals court crisis foreseen, documents showA draft proposal on reforming the World Trade Organization leaves open the question of resolving the organisation's broken appeals bench and asks trade ministers to decide later this month, according to documents seen by Reuters on Wednesday. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 12:11:15 GMT AELB5WRBYRIAPBVUBK3E7WYQ3I https://www.reuters.com/business/no-solution-wto-appeals-court-crisis-foreseen-documents-show-2024-02-14/Emma Farge商业
Microsoft says it caught hackers from China, Russia and Iran using its AI toolsState-backed hackers from Russia, China, and Iran have been using tools from Microsoft-backed OpenAI to hone their skills and trick their targets, according to a report published on Wednesday. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 12:05:28 GMT 42YIQF6ZS5NIVMA44ABUO5R4FQ https://www.reuters.com/technology/cybersecurity/microsoft-says-it-caught-hackers-china-Russia-iran-using-its-ai-tools-2024-02-14/Raphael Satter技术网络安全
